name: 楊勝明
objective: 無刷直流及永磁同步電動機具有高效率、高功率 - 質量比，在家電、工業設備、及電動車輛產業都已被廣泛的應用，為目前最主要的動力馬達。本課程從基本的磁路分析及永久磁鐵開始，首先介紹無刷直流的運轉原理及控制方法，然後探討永磁同步電動機之控制理論，及驅動電路技術，最後說明控制系統實現及無轉軸位置感測器控制的方法。
schedule:
1. Electromagnetic energy conversion (Chapter 1)
2. BLDC basics (Chapter 2)
3. BLDC basics (Chapter 2)
4. BLDC drive and control (Chapter 3)
5. BLDC drive and control (Chapter 3)
6. Complex vector transformation (Chapter 4)
7. PMSM mathematical model (Chapter 4)
8. Vector control, current control (Chapter 5)
9. Mid-term exam
10. Field-weakening, position and speed (Chapter 5)
11. Sinusoidal and space vector PWM (Chapter 6)
12. Neutral voltage and blanking-time (Chapter 6)
13. Implementation of control system (Chapter 7)
14. Parameter measurements (Chapter 7)
15. Model-based sensorless vector control (Chapter 8)
16. HFVI-based sensorless vector control (Chapter 9)
17. Direct torque control (Chapter 10)
18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
Home works: 20%
Mid-term exam: 40%
Final exam: 40%
materials:
Text: Lecture notes.

References:
1. Brushless Motors - Magnetic Design, Performance, and Control, by Duane Hanselman, 2012.
2. Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, by Ramu Krishnan, CRC 
Press 2010.
3. Control of Electric Machine Drive Systems, Seung-Ki Sul, IEEE Press, 2012.
